Package uNumberLibrary

Class UNumberWithSqrt

  • java.lang.Object
    • uNumberLibrary.UNumber
      • uNumberLibrary.UNumberWithSqrt
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<UNumber>
    public class UNumberWithSqrt
extends UNumber

    Title: UNumber With Square Root Class

    Description: This class is sub-class which inherits all the properties of UNumber Class and contains new methods which compute the square root of Ultimate Precision UNumbers.

    Version:
    1.00 Implementation of Newton Raphson Method for Calculating Square Roots., 1.01 Resubmission Update Updated the program to show iteration status of Newton Raphson Method with Convergence Speed.
    Author:
    JSGREWAL, Lynn Robert Carter

        public UNumber sqrt​(UNumber uno)
        This Public Method Calculates square root of a Given UNumber by Using Newton Raphson Method
        Parameters:
        uno - The UNumber whose square root is to be calculated.
        Returns:
        result The Square root of the given number.
